content.question: Human capital refers to which of the following?

choices.label: The skills and knowledge that enable a worker to be productive
Machinery used by workers in production
The accumulated financial wealth of households
Physical capital owned by households rather than businesses
Activities that lead to the substitution of physical capital for labor

content.answer: The skills and knowledge that enable a worker to be productive
